summary:
Keren Levi is a choreographer based in Amsterdam. Between dance, live music and video Levi’s work is best described as interdisciplinary, yet in its core it is founded on choreographic principles. Since 2017, Levi's company NeverLike has been receiving  structural funding support from the city of Amsterdam. 

Keren Levi’s body of work includes "Territory" (2004) , a performance about identity and framing, the duet "Couple-Like" in collaboration with Ugo Dehaes (2006), "The Dry Piece" (2013), a video dance performance about beauty, symmetry and femininity, which received its XL EDITION on 2016,  the sound-movement concert “Clubbing” (2015), a collaboration with composer Tom Parkinson, "Footnotes"(2018) based on a translation on a musical score (Crippled Symmetry by Morton Feldman) yet another collaboration with Parkinson and artist Krijn de Koning who created an artwork especially for this piece, and "unmute" (2019), a music-dance piece in collaboration with composer Yannis Kyriakides and percussion group Slagwerk Den Hague. Levi's upcoming performance "In Service" (2020) is a commission by Norrdans, Sweden. 

Levi teaches  in The School for New Dance Development (SNDO), as well as in festivals, training programs and companies across Europe. In 2014 she has graduated from the MA program of Amsterdam Master of Choreography (AMCh).

profile_positions.description:
Stichting NeverLike facilitates the creation and presentation of performances made by the choreographer Keren Levi. 
NeverLike also aims to increase public visibility of other artists the foundation serves by developing ways in which their projects can exceed the usual context of presentation. For instance by forming context programs that integrate lectures, workshops and concerts which offer the public additional information about the content of their performances.


NeverLike wish to utilize  and develop the cognitive attributes that are inherent in the field of dance and performance and to strengthen the position of dance and performance in the community. The foundation offers performances, training and education programs for professionals and students, as well as for amateurs and youngsters. By partially focusing on youngsters, NeverLike aspires to contribute to the developments of youngsters by broadening their awareness of both their physical and mental states, and being in the world.
profile_positions.title: artistic director

profile_positions.description:
CHOREOGRAPHIES (2004-2022)
Topsy Turvy (2022) - video dance performance for 4+. (live) video, animation and dance
There She is (2018-2022) - solo performance about farewell & memory. between storytelling & dance
In Service (2020) -commission Norrdans, SW
Unmute (2019) - music dance, with Yannis Kyriakides & Slaagwerk Den Hague
Footnotes (2018) - video dance, with Krijn de Koning & Tom Parkinson 
Otherland (2017) - doco-dance film about vouging, with Jan Pieter Tuinstra. Co production BlackFrame & NTR
Otherland (2017) - doco-dance film about a vogue dancer and his journey to NL. a collaboration with Jan Pieter Tuinstra. Co production BlackFrame & NTR
The Dry Piece | XL Edition (2012-2016) - video dance, in conversation with water ballet and the films of Busby Burkley WINNER OF DIORAPTHE AWARD 2013
Clubbing (2015) - music dance, a collaboration with Tom Parkinson 
Up Side Down (2016) - video dance performance for children age 4+, a collaboration with Dalija Acin-Thelander 
Big Mouth (2009) - dance. a collaboration with Niv Sheinfeld and Oren Laor 
The Prize Piece (2007) - performance. BNG AWARD commission
Couple-Like (2006-11) - dance. a collaboration with Ugo Deheas WINNER OF ZILVEREN KREKEL 2011
Territory (2004) -  music dance video. a collaboration with Tammuz Binshtock & Tom Parkinson. WINNER OF BNG AWARD 2007

TEACHING 
(present days)
New Dance Development School (SNDO)
Artistic Research (ArteZ)
(2001 - 2011)
Dance Academies:
Modern Dance Department (MTD), Theatre School Amsterdam NL, SEAD Salzburg, Fontys Dance Academy (Tilburg NL) 
Training Professional Dancers:
HJS (Amsterdam), The Loft (Brussels), Tanzquartier (Vienna ), Kampnagel (Hamburg), Danscentrum (Stockholm), Moscow Dance Agency TSEKH (Moscow), Pula Summer Workshop, Kalamata Interantional Dance Festival, ImpulsTanz (Vienna), Charleroi/Danses (Charleroi), Chrisztina De Chatel (Amsterdam), Ultimavez (Brussels), Sasha Waltz & Guests (Berlin), Ballet-de-Marseille (Marseille)
profile_positions.title: Choreopgraphies| Teaching | Dancing
